item.title: 纽约审计长称，2024 年华尔街奖金预计将增长 7% 以上
item.description: 纽约州主计长托马斯-迪纳波利（Thomas DiNapoli）周三公布的一份报告显示，随着交易量的回升，投资银行的收费也随之增加，2024 年华尔街交易员的奖金可能会增加 7.4%。【原文：Bonuses for Wall Street dealmakers could expand by 7.4% in 2024 as a rebound in dealmaking boosts fees pocketed by investment banks, according to a report published by New York State Comptroller Thomas DiNapoli on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国称对欧盟白兰地的反倾销举措是合法贸易措施
item.description: 中国商务部周三表示，中国对从欧盟进口的白兰地采取的反倾销措施是 "合法的贸易救济措施"，这是在实施临时限制措施的第二天。【原文：China's anti-dumping measures against brandies imported from the European Union are "legitimate trade remedy measures", the commerce ministry said on Wednesday, a day after imposing the temporary curb.】

item.title: Stellantis 出售 Comau 股份有望获得意大利批准
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的消息人士周三透露，Stellantis 公司计划将其机器人业务部门 Comau 的多数股权出售给 One Equity Partners，该计划有望获得意大利政府的支持。【原文：Stellantis is on course to secure the Italian government's backing for its planned sale of a majority stake in its robotic unit Comau to One Equity Partners, a source familiar with the matter said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国 9 月银行贷款将在政策支持下增加
item.description: 路透社周三的一项民意调查显示，随着中国央行加大刺激力度，推动萎靡不振的经济向今年的增长目标迈进，9月份中国新增人民币贷款可能比8月份猛增。【原文：China's new yuan loans likely jumped in September from August, a Reuters poll showed on Wednesday, as the central bank ramps up stimulus to drive the sputtering economy towards this year's growth target.】

item.title: 地缘政治纷争可能导致全球经济在 5 年内损失 14.5 万亿美元 - 伦敦劳合社
item.description: 伦敦保险市场劳合社（SOLYD.UL）周三表示，假设地缘政治冲突对供应链造成冲击，全球经济可能在五年内面临 14.5 万亿美元的损失。【原文：The global economy could face losses of $14.5 trillion over a five-year period from a hypothetical geopolitical conflict which hits supply chains, insurance market Lloyd's of London (SOLYD.UL) said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 欧洲央行决策者力挺 10 月降息
item.description: 由于中东地区的动荡加剧了能源成本的波动，几位欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）的政策制定者在周三为下周再次降息进行了论证，尽管他们中的一些人仍然不以为然。【原文：Several European Central Bank policymakers argued their case on Wednesday for another interest rate cut next week, even if some of their colleagues remained unconvinced as turmoil in the Middle East fuels volatility in energy costs.】

item.title: 受梅赛德斯品牌和亚洲市场拖累，戴姆勒卡车第三季度销量下降 11
item.description: 戴姆勒卡车公司（Daimler Truck）周三表示，受主要梅赛德斯-奔驰卡车品牌和亚洲业务部门的拖累，第三季度销量下降了 11%。【原文：Daimler Truck on Wednesday said third quarter sales fell by 11%, dragged down by its main Mercedes-Benz Trucks brand and its Asian unit.】

item.title: 通胀风险犹存，新加坡维持货币政策不变
item.description: 在地缘政治紧张局势导致通胀和经济增长存在不确定性的情况下，人们普遍预计新加坡央行下周将维持货币政策不变，并暂缓放宽政策。【原文：Singapore's central bank is widely expected to keep monetary policy unchanged next week and hold off easing settings amid inflation and growth uncertainties caused by geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: 惠誉称世界经济去碳化进展过于缓慢
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）在周三发布的一份报告中警告说，全球经济的去碳化进程过于缓慢，虽然大型发达经济体的情况有所改善，但新兴市场却未能实现减排。【原文：Decarbonisation of the global economy is progressing too slowly and while there has been improvement among big developed economies, emerging markets have failed to make reductions, Fitch Ratings warned in a report published on Wednesday.】

item.title: 韩国被纳入富时罗素债券指数有望巩固当地市场
item.description: 韩国主权债券被意外纳入富时罗素基准债券指数（FTSE Russell's benchmark bond index），预计将在周四提振韩元，并在未来几年吸引数十亿美元的资金流入。【原文：The surprise inclusion of South Korean sovereign bonds in the FTSE Russell's benchmark bond index is expected to give the won currency a boost on Thursday and attract billions of dollars of inflows over the next few years.】

item.title: 中国称针对欧盟白兰地的反倾销举措为合法贸易措施
item.description: 中国商务部周三表示，中国对欧盟进口白兰地采取的反倾销措施是 "合法的贸易救济措施"。【原文：China's anti-dumping measures against imported brandies from the European Union are "legitimate trade remedy measures", its commerce ministry said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车公司副首席执行官在管理层重组中卸任
item.description: 沃尔沃汽车公司（Volvo Cars）周三表示，公司副首席执行官比约恩-安沃尔（Bjorn Annwall）将离开集团，这是公司重组的一部分，重组的目的是提高简洁性、速度和协作性，降低组织的复杂性。【原文：Volvo Cars said on Wednesday its deputy CEO Bjorn Annwall will leave the group as part of a reorganisation designed to increase simplicity, speed and collaboration and reduce complexity in the organisation.】

item.title: 凯雷支持的理学寻求在东京首次公开募股中筹集高达 8.7 亿美元的资金
item.description: 日本 X 射线测试工具制造商理学公司周三提交的一份监管文件显示，该公司暂定的首次公开募股（IPO）价格区间为每股 1,230 至 1,260 日元（8.48 美元），而最初预计的价格区间为 1,230 日元。【原文：Japan X-ray testing tool maker Rigaku set a tentative initial public offering (IPO) price range of 1,230 to 1,260 yen ($8.48) per share against an initial estimate of 1,230 yen, a regulatory filing showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 德国 8 月出口增长，一反下降预期
item.description: 周三的官方数据显示，由于美国的强劲需求，德国 8 月份的出口有所增长。【原文：German exports rose in August due to strong demand from the United States, official data showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 法国立法者权衡遏制潮一代高昂养老金的政治风险
item.description: 法国政府已将该国昂贵的养老金账单重新提上议事日程，以减少预算缺口。但这一次，政府希望养老金领取者自己为紧缩开支做出贡献。政府还希望习惯于迎合老年选民的立法者支持这项法案。【原文：France's government has put the country's expensive pensions bill back on the agenda as it seeks to reduce a gaping budget hole. But this time, it wants pensioners to contribute to belt-tightening efforts themselves. It also wants lawmakers used to pandering to older voters to back it.】

item.title: 台积电第三季度营收轻松超越市场预期
item.description: 全球最大的合约芯片制造商台积电周三公布的第三季度营收轻松超过了市场和公司自己的预期，因为它从人工智能（AI）需求中获益良多。【原文：TSMC , the world's largest contract chipmaker, reported on Wednesday third-quarter revenue that easily beat both the market and company's own forecasts as it reaped the benefit from artificial intelligence (AI) demand.】

item.title: 力拓将以 67 亿美元收购钒锂公司
item.description: 力拓周三表示，将以全现金交易的方式收购 Arcadium Lithium 公司，后者的估值为 67 亿美元。【原文：Rio Tinto said on Wednesday it will acquire Arcadium Lithium in an all-cash transaction, valuing the latter at $6.7 billion.】

item.title: 印度中央银行维持利率不变，立场转为 "中性"，预示未来将降息
item.description: 印度储备银行（RBI）周三一如市场普遍预期维持关键利率不变，但将政策立场改为 "中性"，在经济放缓的早期迹象中为降息敞开了大门。【原文：The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) kept its key interest rate unchanged on Wednesday as widely expected, but changed its policy stance to "neutral", opening the door for rate cuts amid early signs of a slowdown in the economy.】

item.title: 早间新闻中国股市接受现实检验；欧洲股市震荡
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 即将上市的现代汽车印度公司的运营情况
item.description: 现代汽车印度公司将于下周启动首次公开募股（IPO），这是现代汽车母公司首次在韩国境外上市，也是印度自 2003 年以来首次汽车制造商 IPO。【原文：Hyundai Motor India will launch its IPO next week, marking parent Hyundai's first listing outside South Korea and India's first carmaker IPO since 2003.】

item.title: 现代汽车 30 亿美元印度首次公开募股定价为每股 1865-1960 卢比
item.description: 印度《金融快报》周三刊登的一则广告显示，现代汽车印度公司已将其首次公开募股（IPO）的价格区间定为1865卢比（22美元）至1960卢比（23美元），下周开始接受认购。【原文：Hyundai Motor India has set a price range of 1,865 rupees ($22) to 1,960 rupees ($23) for its initial public offering (IPO) that opens next week for subscriptions, a advertisement in the Financial Express newspaper showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 油价因以色列-真主党可能实现停火而下滑后保持稳定
item.description: 周三亚市盘中，油价保持稳定，交易商在权衡中东冲突事态发展的不确定性和持续看跌的基本面因素后作出了决定。【原文：Oil prices steadied in Asian trading on Wednesday, as traders weighed uncertainty surrounding developments in the Middle East conflict against continued bearish fundamentals.】

item.title: 波音公司在与罢工工会谈判后撤回薪酬提议
item.description: 波音公司周二表示，在与国际机械师和航空航天工人协会（IAM）进行谈判后，该公司已撤回其薪酬提议。【原文：Boeing on Tuesday said that it has withdrawn its pay offer after negotiations with the International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers (IAM), whose members are on a strike against the company.】

item.title: 中国炙热涨势暂缓，等待刺激政策出台
item.description: 由于投资者对中国经济复苏的热情有所减弱，周三中国股市下跌，大宗商品大幅下挫，而更广泛的市场则因对美国经济能够避免衰退并支撑全球需求的预期而趋于稳定。【原文：Chinese shares fell on Wednesday and commodities nursed sharp losses as investors tempered enthusiasm for a Chinese economic recovery, while broader markets steadied on expectations that the U.S. economy can avoid recession and support global demand.】

item.title: 美国概述谷歌搜索案的潜在补救措施
item.description: 美国司法部周二表示，正在考虑要求法官迫使 Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司终止独家协议，法院早些时候裁定这些协议帮助这家大型科技公司垄断了在线搜索领域。【原文：The U.S. Department of Justice said on Tuesday it was considering asking a judge to force Alphabet's Google to end exclusive agreements that the court earlier ruled helped give the Big Tech firm a monopoly in online search.】

item.title: 阿根廷将削减部分进口产品的繁文缛节
item.description: 阿根廷政府宣布将采取一些措施来精简和简化国内贸易业务。【原文：Argentina's government announced it will implement some measures to streamline and simplify trade operations in the country.】

item.title: 中国股市大幅下跌，连胜势头将被终结
item.description: 中国大陆股市周三大幅低开，并有望结束十日连涨，因为官员们未能对旨在振兴经济的刺激计划激起信心。【原文：Mainland China stocks opened sharply lower Wednesday and were poised to snap a 10-day winning streak after officials failed to inspire confidence in stimulus plans intended to revive the economy.】

item.title: 美联储会议纪要公布前美元持稳，降息后新西兰元下跌
item.description: 由于投资者暂停评估美国的利率路径前景，美元周三横盘震荡，在上周大幅反弹至七周高点后，给日元和其他主要货币带来了一些宽慰。【原文：The dollar drifted sideways on Wednesday, giving some relief to the yen and other major currencies after a sharp rally to a seven-week high last week, as investors paused to assess the interest rate path outlook for the United States.】

item.title: 新西兰央行降息 50 个基点，为更多宽松政策敞开大门
item.description: 新西兰央行周三将利率下调了 50 个基点，并表示即使通胀率已经恢复到目标水平，政策仍然是限制性的，这一明显的鸽派信号使得新西兰元汇率下滑，因为市场押注会有更多的宽松政策。【原文：New Zealand's central bank slashed rates by 50 basis points on Wednesday and said policy is still restrictive even though inflation has returned to target, a clear dovish signal that sent the kiwi dollar skidding as markets bet on more easing.】

item.title: 在报道 Couche-Tard 提高收购出价后，Seven & i 股价大涨 9.5
item.description: 据彭博新闻社报道，Alimentation Couche-Tard 将收购价格提高到每股 18.19 美元后，Seven & i Holdings 的股票在周三早盘交易中大涨 9.5%。【原文：Shares in Seven & i Holdings surged 9.5% in morning trading on Wednesday after Bloomberg News reported Alimentation Couche-Tard upped its acquisition price offer to $18.19 per share.】
